headline: HCA Healthcare (NYSE:HCA) Appoints New SVP Of Development As Shares Rise 4%
summary: HCA Healthcare (NYSE:HCA) recently experienced a 15% price increase over the last quarter, influenced significantly by the appointment of Monica Cintado as Senior Vice President of Development. In a quarter marked by market volatility, including a 3.4% decline, HCA's strategic executive change stood out amid broader economic concerns related to looming tariffs. Alongside this, the company's buyback plan and positive corporate guidance for 2025 likely reinforced investor confidence. Notably,...

headline: HCA Healthcare Names Monica Cintado as Senior Vice President of Development
summary: NASHVILLE, Tenn., April 01, 2025--HCA Healthcare, Inc. (NYSE:HCA), one of the nation’s leading healthcare providers, today announced that Monica Cintado has been appointed as senior vice president of development, effective immediately.
